name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
description: Basic principles of organic chemistry, including hydrocarbons and functional groups.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Introduction to alkanes, alkenes, and alkynes.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Overview of functional groups in organic molecules.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry
lessons.description: Study of stereochemistry and isomerism.

name: Organic Reaction Mechanisms
description: Exploring the mechanisms of organic reactions, including nucleophilic substitution.

lessons.name: Nucleophilic Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Understanding SN1 and SN2 mechanisms.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: Study of E1 and E2 elimination reactions.

lessons.name: Reaction Intermediates
lessons.description: Carbocations, carbanions, and radicals in reaction mechanisms.

name: Spectroscopic Techniques
description: Using spectroscopy to determine molecular structure.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Basics of inorganic chemistry, including atomic structure and periodicity.

lessons.name: Atomic Structure
lessons.description: Understanding atomic orbitals and electron configurations.

lessons.name: Periodic Trends
lessons.description: Exploring trends across the periodic table.

lessons.name: Bonding in Inorganic Compounds
lessons.description: Study of ionic, covalent, and metallic bonding.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Introduction to coordination compounds and their properties.

name: Crystal Field Theory
description: Detailed study of crystal field theory and its impact on transition metal chemistry.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Basic principles of thermodynamics and their application to physical chemistry.

lessons.name: First Law of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the first law of thermodynamics and energy conservation.

lessons.name: Entropy and the Second Law
lessons.description: Understanding entropy and the second law of thermodynamics.

lessons.name: Free Energy and Equilibrium
lessons.description: Study of Gibbs free energy and chemical equilibrium.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Understanding the rates of chemical reactions and reaction mechanisms.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics and its application to chemistry.

name: Introduction to Elvish Language
description: Overview of the Elvish languages, including Sindarin and Quenya.

lessons.name: Sindarin Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to the Sindarin language and its grammar.

lessons.name: Quenya Basics
lessons.description: Overview of Quenya and its use in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Elvish Script
lessons.description: Study of Tengwar script used for writing Elvish languages.

name: Dwarvish Language and Script
description: Exploring the Dwarvish language (Khuzdul) and its script.

name: Black Speech of Mordor
description: Study of the Black Speech of Mordor and its role in Middle-earth.
